howToAuthenticate.header: วิธีการล็อกอิน:
text: ไปที่เพจตั้งค่า (อยู่ที่มุมขวา) เสร็จแล้วไปที่แท็บ "AniList"
คุณจะเห็นปุ่ม "ล็อกอิน" ซึ่งจะพาคุณไปที่เพจล็อกอินของ AniList
หลังจากใส่ข้อมูลล็อกอินแล้ว เพจจะปิดเองโดยอัตโนมัติและการล็อกอินควรจะสำเร็จแล้ว

transfer.title: ZeroTwo becomes Mikazuki
transfer.text:
Dear ZeroTwo users
The people that follow the Discord server's update information will already know that I already had plans to rename ZeroTwo for some time.
The reason of renaming ZeroTwo are simply the new name being more neutral and more comfortable as far as my own personal feelings are concerned.
Using a poll on Discord, it was decided, by a majority, to use mikazuki.moe as the new domain.
Starting 7th April 2020, zerotwo.org will be discontinued and no longer reachable whereas mikazuki.moe is available starting today.
To continue using ZeroTwo, now being called Mikazuki, please switch to mikazuki.moe.
Please mind that you will have to re-login on mikazuki.moe as you can't transfer data from zerotwo.org to mikazuki.moe.
Also your settings you had on zerotwo.org, like the refresh timer interval, have to be reset.

NicoAiko
Mikazuki main developer
